verses.verse: And the sons of Jahdai were Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah, and Shaaph.
Maachah, Caleb’s concubine, bore Sheber and Tirhanah.
She also bore Shaaph the father of Madmannah, Sheva the father of Machbenah and the father of Gibea. And the daughter of Caleb was (Josh. 15:17) Achsah.
These were the descendants of Caleb: The sons of (1 Chr. 4:4) Hur, the firstborn of Ephrathah, were Shobal the father of (Josh. 9:17; 18:14) Kirjath Jearim,
Salma the father of Bethlehem, and Hareph the father of Beth Gader.
And Shobal the father of Kirjath Jearim had descendants: Haroeh, and half of the families of Manuhoth.
The families of Kirjath Jearim were the Ithrites, the Puthites, the Shumathites, and the Mishraites. From these came the Zorathites and the Eshtaolites.
The sons of Salma were Bethlehem, the Netophathites, Atroth Beth Joab, half of the Manahethites, and the Zorites.

And the families of the scribes who dwelt at Jabez were the Tirathites, the Shimeathites, and the Suchathites. These were the (Judg. 1:16) Kenites who came from Hammath, the father of the house of (2 Kin. 10:15; Jer. 35:2) Rechab.

The Family of David Now these were the sons of David who were born to him in Hebron: The firstborn was (2 Sam. 3:2-5) Amnon, by (1 Sam. 25:43) Ahinoam the (Josh. 15:56) Jezreelitess; the second, Daniel, by (1 Sam. 25:39-42) Abigail the Carmelitess;
the third, (2 Sam. 13:37; 15:1) Absalom the son of Maacah, the daughter of Talmai, king of Geshur; the fourth, (1 Kin. 1:5) Adonijah the son of Haggith;
the fifth, Shephatiah, by Abital; the sixth, Ithream, by his wife (2 Sam. 3:5) Eglah.
These six were born to him in Hebron. (2 Sam. 2:11) There he reigned seven years and six months, and (2 Sam. 5:5) in Jerusalem he reigned thirty-three years.
(1 Chr. 14:4-7) And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan, and (2 Sam. 12:24, 25) Solomon—four by Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel.
Also there were Ibhar, Elishama, Eliphelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada, and Eliphelet— (2 Sam. 5:14-16) nine in all.
These were all the sons of David, besides the sons of the concubines, and (2 Sam. 13:1) Tamar their sister.
The Family of Solomon Solomon’s son was (1 Kin. 11:43; Matt. 1:7-10) Rehoboam; Abijah was his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
Amon his son, and Josiah his son.
The sons of Josiah were Johanan the firstborn, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, and the fourth Shallum.
